column5: Finally finished the work on my truck for the trip to Ontario next week so it was time to tune and maintain the sled for season. Got her all cleaned and shined up then I took her for a short ride. We're still hurtin' big time in the snow dept. though. Hopefully a bunch will fall while I'm down South visitin' and chasing steel.  Here's a few pic of her in her Sunday best!!!          Hard to believe she's 8 years old now.

We're still hurtin' big time in the snow dept. though. Hopefully a bunch will fall while I'm down South    You're probably hurtin' in the daylight dept. up there too.  That things looks mint after 8 years of service. How many kms?
You're probably hurtin' in the daylight dept. up there too.  That things looks mint after 8 years of service. How many kms?  She's got a little over 4,400kms now most of it towing my ice hut.
4,400 kms in 8 years, you're good for another 20 on that machine!
ooks good, 8 years eh...time flies when you're having fun  Hows the ice thickness...my daughter got out this weekend too
ooks good, 8 years eh...time flies when you're having fun  Hows the ice thickness...my daughter got out this weekend too  Be about a foot or more by now Dara.
Mine is ready to go too. .......if winter ever shows up!!!
